Normal wolves always hunt at maximum intensity (theta=1), but you can choose differently.

I chose this theta because the sheep population is decreasing, which means food is becoming scarcer. By lowering my hunting intensity to 0.30, I can conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves who may be hunting at maximum intensity. This strategy allows me to survive longer while waiting for a better opportunity to hunt.
